Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 19th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Ricky Steppe (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/21/2019, off Richard Baeza (WAS)...
Injured on 9/1/2019 with a Fractured Finger, out for 3 weeks...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2019...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Houston on 6/28/2020...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Sets a new season NL-Record for Hits with 204 on 9/22/2020...
